title: Shaman C.Amarok Killer (90+)
comment_one:
*1 = As much as needed to hit ~2.6k accuracy AFTER accuracy cards equipped
*100 = max this last
comment_two:
*100 talent to max before *99 to max
*25 = Depends on chopping high score
comment_three: ﻿﻿﻿Virile Vials are a huge damage boost, and crazy concotions will be your main source of burst damage
notes:
FMJ Bullet, Midnight Cookie, Golden Kebabs, and Golden Nomwich if you are not afraid to step away and swap to healing food as needed.
A single properly used crazy concoctions can "one shot" him, while he is vulnerable from your auto attack. Perfect vial usage is 350 ms (.35 seconds) then release for damage vial, if fast enough you can throw 4 vials making this fight very easy.
